ops.mr: Execute script #%3 in extern group %1 (priority %2/6) - Only if the script is not already running|_script(groupID)|priority|scriptID

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “I used to be in SOLDIER…
Afterwards, I opened this shop…”{PAUSE}“But to tell you the truth,
I'd rather be at the shop downstairs.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “I used to be in SOLDIER.
Lately, I've felt like dressing up like this…”{PAUSE}“I know it's out of season, but…”

dialogStrings:
“I used to be in SOLDIER…
Afterwards, I opened this shop…”{PAUSE}“But to tell you the truth,
I'd rather be at the shop downstairs.”

“I used to be in SOLDIER.
Lately, I've felt like dressing up like this…”{PAUSE}“I know it's out of season, but…”
